itunes:subtitle: Eric Trump joins the show to talk about what it was like for the family when his dad ran for president, the findings of the Durham Report, if Donald Trump will be running for president in 2024 and why his dad ran in 2016, and just how bad the media has b...
itunes:summary:
Eric Trump joins the show to talk about what it was like for the family when his dad ran for president, the findings of the Durham Report, if Donald Trump will be running for president in 2024 and why his dad ran in 2016, and just how bad the media has been to the Trump family over the last seven years.
